metadata.title: CVE-2023-52518 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: hci_codec: Fix leaking content of local_codecs The followingmemory leak can be observed when the controller supports codecs which arestored in local_codecs list but the elements are never freed: unreferencedobject 0xffff88800221d840 (size 32): comm "kworker/u3:0", pid 36, jiffies4294898739 (age 127.060s) hex dump (first 32 bytes): f8 d3 02 03 80 88 ffff 80 d8 21 02 80 88 ff ff ..........!..... 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0000 00 00 00 00 00 ................ backtrace: [<ffffffffb324f557>]__kmalloc+0x47/0x120 [<ffffffffb39ef37d>]hci_codec_list_add.isra.0+0x2d/0x160 [<ffffffffb39ef643>]hci_read_codec_capabilities+0x183/0x270 [<ffffffffb39ef9ab>]hci_read_supported_codecs+0x1bb/0x2d0 [<ffffffffb39f162e>]hci_read_local_codecs_sync+0x3e/0x60 [<ffffffffb39ff1b3>]hci_dev_open_sync+0x943/0x11e0 [<ffffffffb396d55d>]hci_power_on+0x10d/0x3f0 [<ffffffffb30c99b4>] process_one_work+0x404/0x800[<ffffffffb30ca134>] worker_thread+0x374/0x670 [<ffffffffb30d9108>]kthread+0x188/0x1c0 [<ffffffffb304db6b>] ret_from_fork+0x2b/0x50[<ffffffffb300206a>] ret_from_fork_asm+0x1a/0x30

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52518` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1030.31~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.10.0-1004.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1007.9~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
